text: hey folks, is anyone looking for short-term contracting work? 2 months or so

My employer, MartianCraft, is looking for 1 or 2 mid to senior level Android developers. MartianCraft is a software development agency building apps for world class clients like IBM, Fox, Apple, and many others. We offer both contract and full time positions. All positions are 100% remote, telecommute, and flextime (we currently have folks working from the US, UK, and EU). Comfortable work atmosphere that is results driven. Currently we’re looking to fill a short-term position with likely a follow-up longer term contract.

If you're interested in learning more, please send me a DM.
